elements.label: Main Character
elements.description: Main characters drive the key storylines. The game will end if any of them dies.

elements.label: Secondary Character
elements.description: Secondary characters affect storylines in various ways. Their fates are not tied to endings.

elements.label: Temperament
elements.description: Galen suggests that temperaments are determined by an excess or lack of 4 body fluids.

elements.label: Chapter
elements.description: Indicate the current chapter.

elements.label: Exhausted
elements.description: Exhausted temperament recharges when a new chapter starts.

elements.label: Story Event: Required
elements.description: This event has to happen somewhere, either with the right or the wrong people, before the story can progress.

elements.label: Skill: Hunter
elements.description: |Skill: Hunter desc|

elements.label: Skill: Scholar
elements.description: |Skill: Scholar desc|

elements.label: Skill: Archer
elements.description: The character is specialized in using bows and crossbows.

elements.label: Skill: Lancer
elements.description: The character is specialized in using lances.

elements.label: Skill: Observer
elements.description: The character is observant in their daily life. They notice details that may be overlooked by others.

elements.label: Skill: Mathematician
elements.description: The character has studied algebra, geometry, in addition to the basic arithmatics.

elements.label: Skill: Fish-monger
elements.description: The character is specialized in catching fish by using nets, a harpoon, or a fishing rod.

elements.label: Skill: Brewer
elements.description: The character is specialized in making beer and wine, sometimes also vinegar.

elements.label: Memory
elements.description: This is a main character's memory. It might be important, who knows.
